mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ucare.receipt( receipt_dt, receipt_time, ins_dt, remark, bp, bs, user_no, patient_no, accept_yn, overlap, state, diagnosis_time ) VALUES( now(), now(), now(), #{remark }, #{bp }, #{bs }, (SELECT user_no FROM ucare.user WHERE id = #{userId } ), #{patientNo }, 'N', 'true', 'careWait', (SELECT MIN(time) FROM ucare.time WHERE date = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND status = false) )

INSERT INTO ucare.receipt( receipt_dt, receipt_time, ins_dt, remark, bp, bs, user_no, patient_no, accept_yn, state, diagnosis_time ) VALUES( now(), now(), now(), #{remark }, #{bp }, #{bs }, (SELECT user_no FROM ucare.user WHERE id = #{userId } ), #{patientNo }, 'N', 'careWait', #{diagnosisTime } )
mapper.select: SELECT A.receipt_no AS receiptNo, A.bp AS bp, A.bs AS bs, B.name AS name, B.gender AS gender, B.age AS age, B.address as address, B.insurance_yn AS insurance, B.diagnosis_type AS diagnosis, B.patient_no AS patientNo, A.receipt_dt AS receiptDt, TO_CHAR(receipt_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS receiptTime, A.remark AS remark, A.state AS state, (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) as no, A.diagnosis_time as diagnosisTime FROM ucare.receipt A INNER JOIN ucare.patient B ON A.patient_no = B.patient_no WHERE A.patient_no = #{patientNo } ORDER BY receipt_no DESC
SELECT overlap AS overlap FROM ucare.receipt WHERE receipt_dt = TO_DATE(#{receiptDt },'YYYY-MM-DD') AND patient_no = #{patientNo }
